author: jeongeun
body:
**PR description:**
Review on the Reco part of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/31113

`process.load("Configuration.StandardSequences.Geometry_cff")`
 was outdated https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/8810 
It should be replaced with
`process.load("Configuration.StandardSequences.GeometryDB_cff")`

In this PR, EgammaAnalysis configuration files (2 files) are fixed.
```
EgammaAnalysis/ElectronTools/test/run_RegressionAndCombination_cfg.py
EgammaAnalysis/ElectronTools/test/run_exampleMva_cfg.py

```

#### PR validation:
Tested in CMSSW_12_5_X, the basic test all passed in the [CMSSW PR instructions](https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html)
title: Replace Geometry_cff with GeometryDB_cff in EgammaAnalysis
